question: 傘立て
sourceMnemonic: This is when you take your <kanji>umbrella</kanji> and you <kanji>stand</kanji> it up. Wait, how is an umbrella standing up? Good question, my dear Crabling, you are putting your umbrella in an <vocabulary>umbrella stand</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the readings for <ja>傘</ja> (learned with the kanji) and <ja>立つ</ja> (to stand).
